name: Icee Maker
summary:
When the thermometer or your thirst rises, bring it back down with a refreshing, chilling, ICEE! Think you are craving this legendary drink now? Just wait until you build the ultimate, irresistible combination of flavors in ICEE maker! Your taste buds will take you to the nearest ICEE machine!

Let the fun begin by choosing your cup and lid or get creative and create your very own cup design! Next, choose from 32 different ICEE flavors, or create and name your very own flavor. Show off your skills and become an unofficial ICEE mixologist!
